DOC.brief_summary: Multicenter multidisciplinary public health project 10 region Bavaria , federal state Germany , target maternal fetal health . The objective trial evaluate efficacy lifestyle intervention program focus diet , physical activity weight monitoring pregnancy . The intervention comprise 4 individual counseling session address healthy living . Primary outcome : gestational weight gain . Secondary outcome pregnancy obstetric complication like gestational diabetes rate caesarean section well offspring health . The lifestyle intervention program adapted German health care system allow immediate implementation successful evaluation .
DOC.criteria: Gestational age ≤ 12th week gestation Age : 18 year 43 year Prepregnancy BMI ≥ 18.5 kg/m2 ≤ 40.0 kg/m2 Sufficient German language skill Written inform consent Multiple pregnancy Any condition prevent physical activity placenta praevia , persistent bleeding , cervical incompetence Prepregnancy diabetes early diagnose gestational diabetes Uncontrolled chronic disease ( e.g . thyroid dysfunction ) Psychiatric psychosomatic disease Any condition may interfere study protocol
